pxlmod64:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
pxlmod64:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

pxlmod64:Attrition.NAME: Attrition
pxlmod64:Attrition.DESCRIPTION: Every turn, apply !M! pxlmod64:Apostasy to ALL enemies.

pxlmod64:Blood_Contract.NAME: Blood Contract
pxlmod64:Blood_Contract.DESCRIPTION: Apply ALL Curses. NL Lose 1 pxlmod64:Card_Draw each turn.

pxlmod64:Ceremonial_Blade.NAME: Ceremonial Blade
pxlmod64:Ceremonial_Blade.DESCRIPTION: Deal [#67D1A1]!pxlmod64:BaseDamage![] damage for the number of cards currently in hand. NL Exhaust.

pxlmod64:Double_Down.NAME: Double_Down
pxlmod64:Double_Down.DESCRIPTION: Permanently gain a copy of one random card in your hand.

pxlmod64:Etched_Dagger.NAME: Etched Dagger
pxlmod64:Etched_Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card in hand.
pxlmod64:Etched_Dagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card in hand.

pxlmod64:Hysteria.NAME: Hysteria
pxlmod64:Hysteria.DESCRIPTION: Apply pxlmod64:Curse_of_Madness to everyone, including yourself.

pxlmod64:Plague.NAME: Plague
pxlmod64:Plague.DESCRIPTION: When the inflicted enemy dies, apply it's curses to ALL enemies.

pxlmod64:Pride.NAME: Pride
pxlmod64:Pride.DESCRIPTION: Gain max HP equal to the number of cards in hand. NL Exhaust.
pxlmod64:Pride.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain max HP equal to the number of cards in hand + 2. NL Exhaust.

pxlmod64:Preachers_Assault.NAME: Preacher's Assault
pxlmod64:Preachers_Assault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to the target's pxlmod64:Apostasy. NL Exhaust.

pxlmod64:Quick_Cut.NAME: Quick Cut
pxlmod64:Quick_Cut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [#67D1A1]!pxlmod64:MultiAttack![] times. NL Draw !M! cards.

pxlmod64:Scourge_Form.NAME: Scourge Form
pxlmod64:Scourge_Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, Transform one card.
pxlmod64:Scourge_Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Transform one card.

pxlmod64:Unhinge.NAME: Unhinge
pxlmod64:Unhinge.DESCRIPTION: Inflict yourself with pxlmod64:Curse_of_Madness.NL Gain !M! pxlmod64:Apostasy.

pxlmod64:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
pxlmod64:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! damage.
